name: The Tropic
description:
In a future universe, the cops are after you and you have to drive manually to avoid them. While one party tries to control the vehicle and avoid traps, the other party has to supply fuel to the vehicle.

Note : I couldn't finish the game the way I wanted :(  There are problems with the controls, you have to take your foot off the gas at some points in order for the vehicle to stay on the road :)

How to play:

W, A, S, D : Vehicle Controls

Left, Right, Up, Down Arrow Keys : Rythm Game Controls

Developer :Yasin Uçar

3D Artist : Onur Tosun
